data.title: Gordon Ramsay and Wife Tana Ramsay Welcome Baby No. 6
data.meta_description: Gordon Ramsay and his wife, Tana Ramsay, recently welcomed their sixth baby in November
data.text:
Gordon Ramsay and Tana Ramsay have a full house of eight after recently welcoming their sixth baby.

â€œWhat an amazing birthday present please welcome Jesse James Ramsay, 7lbs 10oz whopper!!â€ the TV chef, 57, wrote via Instagram on Saturday, November 11. â€œOne more bundle of love to the Ramsay brigade!! 3 boys, 3 girls â€¦ Done ğŸ‘ŠğŸ¼â¤ï¸â¤ï¸.â€

Gordon â€” whose message seemingly hinted that Jesse was born around the chefâ€™s November 8 birthday â€” uploaded several photos of Tana, 49, practicing skin-to-skin contact with the newborn. In one pic, he kissed baby Jesseâ€™s head while the infant rested on Tanaâ€™s chest.

Jesse is the coupleâ€™s sixth child. Gordon and Tana â€” who wed in December 1996 â€” also share Megan, 25, twins Holly and Jack, both 23, Matilda, 22, and Oscar, 4.

â€œItâ€™s been a nerve-wracking 9 months but weâ€™ve made it and we have been blessed with this little bundle,â€ Tana wrote via her Instagram on Saturday. â€œRamsay family definitely complete. Jesse James Ramsay we love you so much â¤ï¸ğŸ™ğŸ¼.â€

Gordon hinted earlier this year that their family was growing.

â€œLast time I looked there were five, yes. I think thereâ€™s one more on the way,â€ the Hellâ€™s Kitchen host quipped during a January appearance on the U.K.â€™s â€œHeart Breakfastâ€ radio show.

Show hosts Jamie Theakston and Amanda Holden tried to press for more details about a possible pregnancy, but Gordon played coy. â€œDo you know what? I donâ€™t know yet. Iâ€™ll double-check when I get back,â€ he joked. â€œIâ€™m going down to [drugstore] Boots on the way out of here, and Iâ€™ll double-check.â€

Gordon added: â€œTana would like another baby and Iâ€™m like, â€˜No, no, no, no.â€™ Itâ€™s already hard enough thinking about when I go to take Oscar to school, [and people ask], â€˜Hey, whatâ€™s your grandadâ€™s name?â€™â€

Oscar is the coupleâ€™s rainbow baby. Tana suffered a miscarriage in 2016.

â€œGordon was amazing,â€ Tana told the U.K.â€™s Metro in November 2020 about how her spouse supported her after the loss. â€œHeâ€™s always been one to talk about everything, and he was very good at sort of talking it out of me and never making me feel that, â€˜Oh, you know, maybe we shouldnâ€™t talk about it.â€™â€

She continued at the time: â€œI have to be honest, when it happened to me, I found it really hard when people would talk to me and not mention it because it was like it never happened. You go from having a baby kicking inside of you to suddenly itâ€™s not there, and it was a really hard experience.â€
